pr_body:
A new Navigation Menu is created in this PR. Its backend is being created here. https://github.com/openwisp/openwisp-utils/pull/175
This branch contains only design. 

@nemesisdesign and @atb00ker please check out this one.

![menu](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42765292/117002590-5f471a80-ad01-11eb-84a5-b6fe609a67df.gif)

Design samples available here. https://miro.com/app/board/o9J_lMAQQZk=/
I request other community members to check this once and give their valuable views about it. Thank you

closes #188

Added js to show current active menu link or group.
If the same link belongs to multiple groups then I am showing the first one as active.
